description: Learn how to make crispy potato fritters with this easy and tasty recipe. Serve with dollops of creme fraiche and a sprinkling of chives.
keywords: Appetisers,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2021,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Autumn,Peanut free
name: Crispy Potato Fritters Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper.
Place a colander inside a large bowl. Fill with cold water. Coarsely grate potatoes and place in submerged colander to prevent potato from turning brown.
Remove colander from bowl and rinse potato under cold running water until water runs clear.
Place a clean tea towel or paper towels on a flat surface. Spread potato over tea towel or paper towels. Cover with another tea towel or more paper towels and press to squeeze out excess liquid.
Place a 7cm round cutter on 1 tray. Place 1/4 cup potato in centre of cutter and press down firmly to form a fritter. Carefully remove cutter and repeat to make a total of 12 fritters.
Spray fritters generously with oil. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden and crunchy. Season.
Combine creme fraiche with 2 tsp chives. Serve fritters topped with creme fraiche mixture and remaining chives, and seasoned with pepper.
